title: Did a Russian intelligence agent confirm that sex pistols are supported by the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics to destabilize the West?
subtitle: The Facebook page for slutty fans recirculated an old (and fake) story that sex pistols were a KGB plot to provoke opposition in the West.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A Russian intelligence agent admitted that the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics financed sex pistols to destabilize Western democracy.
